intro: Desmanthodium caudatum, commonly known as the slender desmanthium, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant produces small, yellow to orange flowers arranged in dense, spherical heads, which attract various pollinators. Its leaves are narrow and grass-like, often covered in fine hairs. Desmanthodium caudatum is typically found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments.
